reviewText:
I haven't seen Hard Rain, but I know for a fact that Drop Zone was an excellent movie!  Wesley Snipes is an amazing actor and he did a fabulous job in this action packed thriller!  I bought this DVD simply because of Drop Zone, but I suppose I'll get around to checking out Hard Rain eventually since it does seem to have a heavy hitting cast of actors in it!

If you're looking for good movies, another good thriller that I'd recommend would be Riccochet!
the both movies are action packed. hard rain has the better story line, Wesley SNIPES IS GOOD IN DROP ZONE I WISH THERE WERE MORE ACTION DOUBLE PACKSLIKE THIS ONE.
both movies are great, only draw back is that one movie is 2.35 aspect ratio and the second is 1.85 aspect ratio and its not labled as such.
Both films are very Good!!!!!
very satisfied
good movies, great cast

These are older movies but they are two great movies.  I dd not have any problem with the DVD's playing.
Both movies are good with great actors.  They are full of action and the story lines are good. Will watch them again.

got this because I love the movie "Hard Rain". Been looking for it for awhile and the only successful place I have found it is on Amazon. Not only was the price right, but it arrived ahead of schedule too.
The mind is a fascinating thing....I remembered both films differently than they are....not quite as good. The DVD is a great buy (2 movies for the price of 1), and delivery was fast.

Really Good DVD.  When I buy used DVD's I always clean them before using them with a special cloth just to make for sure that they work properly.  This one was already cleaned, but of course I cleaned it again and the quality is really great.
There couldn't have been a better combo the these two movies. Love them both, Love Wesley Snipes in every movie, Mr. Freeman and Mr. Slater love the two together, both movies are excellent.
love this movie, i was glad that this movie came on dvd. wesley snipes was great.  hard rain is a great movie too, morgan & christian was fantastic in it.

Well i just really wanted hard Rain but since that is no loner out i had to get these two movies together, Not bad though, to me both movies are great, just tired of cheap boxes how these dvds come in.
Both actors are great in these movies
